titleStmt.title: A short interpretation of the Lords Praier necessary for all housholders to learne, and to teach their children and seruants.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Okes, and are to be sold by Andrevv Driver, at his shop in Staple-Inne gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
